section.title: EVMVmScanByProperty
section.para: EVMVmScanByProperty adds a virtual machine scan job to the queue where a specified property and value identifies the virtual machine. Currently the only honored property value is ipaddress.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate EVMVmScanByProperty usage:

example.title: EVMVmScanByProperty WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="EVMVmScanByProperty"> <part name="property" type="xsd:string" /> <part name="value" type="xsd:string" /> </message> <message name="EVMVmScanByPropertyResponse"> <part name="return" type="xsd:boolean" /> </message>
